This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 4 dim lights traveling across sky from east to west overhead. Lights did not change position while traveling.
divs: sighting detailsat home near division and 76th around 9:30pm est on 03\11\12 a group of 4 dim lights in the shape of a triangle traveled overhead from east to west. lights did not change position, strobe, or make noise while traveling. speed was faster than any jet or airplane. size of the overall group was large. every hair on my body stood up after it happened as this is something i've never witnessed in my life. time viewed was 5 seconds.
